item.description:
Join the ARLB for food, beverages and fun as we celebrate the animals that were adopted from our shelters and the people who love them! Rain or Shine! Your dog will be able to sample products from Well Fed Dog, Polka Dog Bakery and Yoghund. Day will include: Clicker training demonstrations, ask the trainer sessions, pet portraits and live music!

Visit www.arlboston.org/happytails to purchase your tickets today! $15 in advance $20 at the door

https://secure2.convio.net/arlb/site/SPageServer?pagename=2011_Happy_Tails_BBQ

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: The 2nd Annual Happy Tails BBQ
